properties.areaDesc: Laguna Madre From 5 nm North Of Port Mansfield To Baffin Bay TX; Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 27 at 9:24AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Areas of fog continue across the northern Laguna Madre and the
northern portion of the lower Texas coastal gulf waters out to 60
nautical miles offshore. Visibilities have been reduced to one to
three nautical miles in some areas.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should use caution while navigating in these conditions.
Visibilities may change dramatically over short distances. If you
must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog signals. Make
sure all running lights are on..
